details.description: Download a Highway Code leaflet showing signals used by drivers, motorcyclists and cyclists on roads in the UK
details.body:
Download guidance from The Highway Code about all the signals you can make to warn and inform other road users, including pedestrians.

Download ‘Signals to other road users’ (PDF, 100KB)’
details.alternative_title: The Highway Code: Signals to other road users

details.description: Book your driving test or get a tax disc online, find out the legal requirements for buying, owning, importing or scrapping a car or motorcycle, and read about your rights and responsibilities as a driver.
